modDescription:
The mod provides greater penalties for [respawning](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-respawn/).

## Features

* Players have to wait 3 minutes for respawning.
* When they respawn they get following penalties:  
   * After death, players spawn with only 50% food and water. (instead of 100%)  
   * For the first two minutes after respawn: health, stamina, movement and carrying capacity is reduced.
